title: News24.com | Global virus deaths top 150 000 as US braces for lockdown protests
description: Coronavirus deaths have surged past 150 000 worldwide with nearly a quarter of them in the United States, where new rallies against lockdown orders are being held after President Donald Trump lent his support to the protesters.
content:
Coronavirus deaths have surged past 150,000 worldwide with nearly a quarter of them in the United States, where new rallies against lockdown orders are being held after President Donald Trump lent his support to the protesters.
